## WebSocketClientResponse interface

Represents response for websocket request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WebSocketClientResponse<TQueue> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [output](./rest-stompjs.websocketclientresponse.output.md) | <code>TQueue</code> | Object holding output observables for each subscribed queue |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [destroy()](./rest-stompjs.websocketclientresponse.destroy.md) | Destroys currently registered listeners for response |
|  [publish()](./rest-stompjs.websocketclientresponse.publish.md) | Explicitly call publish to queue, can be called only once, if called multiple times, rest of calls do nothing |
